textBeforeTable: You want to keep track of which rounds are being played every day, so here is the complete schedule of play for both weeks at the U.S. Open. The only exception to this will be on the second Friday (September 7) when there will only be a 'Day' session played. During those two weeks, two sessions will be held daily with the 'Day' session starting at 11:00 ET and the 'Night' session starting at 7:00 ET. The U.S. Open will start on Monday, August 27 and will run through Sunday, September 9. textAfterTable: All schedule information via usopen.org. « Prev 3 of 6 Next » Coverage Information Al Bello/Getty Images Do not worry about missing your favorite players at the U.S. Open.You will be able to see live and delayed action on TV as well as online at the official U.S. Open website.
